'''1.21.11 Release Candidate 2''' (known as '''1.21.11-rc2''' in the [[launcher]]) is the second [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.11]], released on December 5, 2025, which fixes a crash.<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-21-11-release-candidate-2|Minecraft 1.21.11 Release Candidate 2|December 5, 2025}}</ref>

A separate [[unobfuscated version]] of 1.21.11 Release Candidate 2 was released, titled '''1.21.11 Release Candidate 2 Unobfuscated''' (or '''1.21.11-rc2_unobfuscated''' when in the launcher). This is an experimental version released in preparation for obfuscation being removed from {{JE}} clients and servers.<ref>{{Mcnet|removing-obfuscation-in-java-edition|Removing obfuscation in Java Edition|October 29, 2025}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash issue affecting some players.
** Fixed by adding safety checks for block and chunk positions while generating or loading terrain.<ref name="diff">{{Citation|url=https://cdn.skye.lol/diffs/1.21.11-rc1_to_1.21.11-rc2.html|title=1.21.11-rc1 to 1.21.11-rc2|website=cdn.skye.lol|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20251224002438/https://cdn.skye.lol/diffs/1.21.11-rc1_to_1.21.11-rc2.html}}</ref></onlyinclude>
